```{python}
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import networkx as nx
```

```{python}
neu = pd.read_csv('Data/traced-neurons.csv')
syn = pd.read_csv('Data/traced-total-connections.csv')
```

```{python}
G = nx.Graph()
G.add_nodes_from(neu['bodyId'])
syn['synaps'] = list(zip(syn.bodyId_pre, syn.bodyId_post))
G.add_edges_from( syn['synaps'] )
```

```{python}
deg = np.array([ d for n, d in G.degree()])
```

```{python}
deg.mean()
```

```{python}
#bins = np.logspace(0, 4, 100)
bins = 100
y, x = np.histogram(deg, bins=bins)
x = (x[1:]+x[:-1])/2
```

```{python}
plt.loglog()
plt.plot(x, y, 'ro')
plt.xlabel('Log Degree log(k)')
plt.ylabel('Log Frequency ')
plt.title('Degree distribution')
plt.show()
```

```{python}
page = nx.algorithms.link_analysis.pagerank(G)
```

```{python}
plt.hist(page.values(), bins=100)
  
plt.show()
```
